APRIL 28, 1877.] THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL. 423

deals, 1,982 pcs. timber, Order. Lesprot @ Fredrikstad, 59,500 boards, Order. Richmond @ Moulmein, Order. Alex. Macleod @ Fredrikstad,—59,932 boards, 2,780 staves, Order. Annie @ Arendal,—2,047 logs timber, 308 deals, 25,894 doz. laths, Order. Mckenzie @ Pensacola,—77,676 boards, 1,236 spars, 843 poles, 799 rickers, Order. Sea-gull @ Christiania,—367,768 staves, Order. Dragen @ Neder Calix,—247 planks, 277 pit props, 68,335 staves, Order. Salus @ New Orleans,—1,700 staves, Order. Pride of Wales @ Darien,—627 logs, 824 pcs. timber, 463 deals, 432 ends, Crow & Co. Capt. P. Dahl @ Savannah,—1,168 pcs. timber, 199 planks, 730 planks, Order. Rebus @ Doboy,—1,083 pcs. timber, Order. Sleipner (s) @ Fredrikstad,—17,522 deals, Order. Harold Haafagen @ Gothenburg,—2,514 bdls. laths. Ithuriel @ Forest Queen @ Pensacola,—4,715 deals, Order. Joaquina @ Pensacola,—797 pcs. deals, Order. Adelheid and Bertha @ Memel,—312 staves, 2 fms. lathwood, Order. Nidarcs @ Christiania,—24,061 boards, 23,456 boards, 66,154 staves, Order. Darwbarn & Co. Record @ Christiania,—619 deals, A. Dempsey. Sertia @ Christiania,—88 t. boxwood, 317 logs mahogany, 15 cs. wainscot wood. Parthenia @ St. Domingo,—55 logs, 194 crotches mahogany, 24 logs satinwood, 2,339 pcs. lignum vitæ, Tomlinson & Co. Barden (s) @ Old Calabar,—5,683 pcs. ebony, Harrison & Co. Macedonia @ Minatitlan,—346 logs mahogany, &c. Yenskabet (s) @ Trieste, Order ; 47 t. boxwood. Uththoff & Co. Demerara (s) @ Trinidad and cedar, Order. Pera (s) @ Constantinople,—20 t. boxwood logs. Luke Bruce @ St. Domingo,—55 logs, 194 crotches mahogany, 24 pcs. lignum vitæ, Tomlinson & Co. Barden (s) @ Old Calabar,—5,683 pcs. ebony, Harrison & Co. Barden (s) @ Old Calabar,—12 logs mahogany and cedar, 15 log ends, 15 planks mahogany, Sundry Consignees.

HULL.—From April 11th to 24th.

Hewn Timber (loads).
Arendal—403 W. Thompson & Sons.
Christiania—340 Allen & English.
282 R. F. Robinson.
250 C. & C. Wells, jun.
234 E. North & Co.
36 Other Importers.
Gothenburg—240 Wilson & Co.
52 Allen & English.
Porsgrund—365 Norway Timber Co.
Stettin—1,387 Wade, Sons, & Co.
194 Horsley, Smith, & Co.
185 Payne, Douthwaite, & Co.

Sawn Timber (loads).
Arendal—670 Rawson & Robinson.
Bordeaux—490 Barkworth & Spaldin.
Christiania—91 Other Importers.
Gothenburg—800 Wade & Co.
176 Heaven & Kesterton.
82 J. T. Russell & Co.
98 Other Importers.
Laurvig—380 J. Staple.
322 Wade & Co.
Staves (loads).
Stettin—10 W. H. Boden.
Pillau—5 Norway Timber Co
Porsgrund—[?]L.

WEST HARTLEPOOL.

Concordia @ Laurvig,—696 pcs. props, 7,790 pcs. battens, 2,248 pcs. boards, Order. Godthaub @ Porsgrund,—2,307 pcs. poles, 693 pcs. pit props, Order. Activ @ Krageroe,—2,077 pcs. pit props, E. S. Jobson & Co. [?] @ Christiania,—16,362 pcs. mining timber, 849 pcs. pit props, Order. Oscar @ Brevig,—2,630 pcs. square timber, 200 pcs. half fir sleepers, Order. Columbus @ Brevig,—3,086 pcs. props and poles, E. S. Jobson & Co. 591 pcs. timber hewn, 163 pcs deals, a quantity of lathwood, Jas. Richardson. Caroline @ Krageroe,—8,423 pcs. crown trees, 1,586 pcs. props, C. Berven. Entracht @ Stettin,—195 pcs. oak timber, Order. Burgermeister Orm @ Stettin,—152 pcs. half fir sleepers, T. Walker & Co. Heimdal @ Gothenburg,—4,902 pcs. pit props, G. Pyman & Co. Here @ Gothenburg,—5,174 pcs. deals and battens, May & Hassell. Peter @ Bergqvara,—1,861 pcs. partially square timber, E. S. Jobson & Co. Malangen @ Krageroe,—4,000 pcs. pit props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Frithjof @ Krageroe,—990 pcs. pit props, A. B. Richardson & Co. Sarah @ Dortrecht,—7,216 pit props, Order. Sonderhoe @ Halmstad,—1,108 pcs. round sleeper blocks, 1,797 pcs. pit props, D. Forbes & Co. Avance @ Krageroe,—333 pcs. props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Luna @ Halmstad,—1,086 pcs. pit props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Fenelon @ Krageroe,—1,744 pcs. square timber, 1,249 pcs. round timber, 374 pcs. props, Order. Bylgia @ Fredrikstad,—19,326 pcs. planed boards, Jobson & Co. Borre @ Christiania,—14,983 pcs. props, C. Berven. Hesperus @ Carlshamn,—4,647 pcs. pit props, Groves, Maclean, & Co. Attas @ Brevig,—1,270 pcs. square timber, 1,518 pcs. round timber, 1,518 pcs. round timber, 619 deals, A. D. Forbes & Co.

timber, 195 pcs. props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Annie @ Bergqvara,—11,781 pcs. pit props, Order. Falken @ Stromstadt,—10,902 pcs. pit props, Order. Rival @ Dantzic,—1,124 pcs. oak timber, 28 pcs. props, R. Wade, Sons. Melia @ Arendal,—975 pcs. mining timber, 77 pcs. telegraph poles, 931 pcs. round timber, 1,013 pcs. props, C. Berven. Sophie @ Krageroe,—736 pcs. square timber (s) @ Gothenburg,—& Co. Coral Queen @ Christiania,—5,302 pcs. deals, 23,847 bundles of laths, Order.

NEWCASTLE-ON-TYNE.

April 11. Rata @ Christiania,—10,486 pcs. pit props, W. Southern & Sons.
April 12. Ida @ Porsgrund,—3,943 pcs. battens, 2,724 pcs. battens, 581 pcs. battens, Hardy Brothers. Sjofrida @ Mandal,—615 pcs. mining timber, 8,828 pcs. props, Pyman, Bell, & Co. Hulda Emelie @ Gothenburg,—4,558 pcs. deals and battens, Hardy Brothers. Eline @ Gothenburg,—12,658 pcs. boards, V. Sheppard. Argo @ Gothenburg,—4,570 pcs. deals and battens, Pyman, Bell, & Co. Marie Auguste @ Gothenburg,—11,654 pcs. battens, 183 pcs. headings, &c. Flora @ Laurvig,—2,900 battens, Carr & Co.
April 14. Nil.
April 16. Charlotta @ Gothenburg,—5,000 logs sawn pine timber, 769 logs deals, Order. Unionen @ Fredrikstad,—12,393 pcs. staves, P. Osbeck. Capo @ Fredrikstad,—297,061 pcs. staves, Order.
April 17. Edgar @ Darien,—206 logs whitewood deals, 870 logs whitewood deals, 1,200 logs staves, P. Osbeck. Ceres @ Memel,—1,737 logs staves, W. Southern & Sons.
April 18. Holsatia @ Memel,—2,051 logs staves, J. Lawrence & Co.
April 19. Embla @ Christiansand,—39,597 logs pit props, Hall Brothers. Ellida @ Christiansand,—123,000 feet staves, Order. Admiralen @ Fredrikstadt,—145,892 pcs. staves, Order. Heimskringla @ Frederiksvoern,—4,918 pcs. timber, 181 pcs. pit props, Order.
April 20. Oscar @ Porsgrund,—95,274 pcs. staves, 444 pcs. battens, J. Lawrence & Co. Sophie @ Wilhelmshaven, 49 deals, Descalzo ; 5,162 blocks of wood, Brosinovich & Co.
April 21. Nil.
April 23. Hugin @ Gothenburg,—qty. birchwood, qty. of sawn and hewn firwood, Order. Triton @ Gothenburg,—13,186 props, Order.
April 24. Stadt @ Christiania,—qty. pit props and staves, P. Osbeck. Vertranen @ Gothenburg,—qty. crown trees and pit props, qty. staves, Pyman, Bell & Co. Vertranen @ Danzig,—109 oak crooks, 501 pcs. timber, 173 pcs. deals, 413 deal ends, J. H. Wilson.

LEITH.

April 12. Diana @ Namsos,—13,285 battens, Mackie, Koth, & Co.
April 13. Speculation @ Moss,—4350 props, 4,527 battens, 479 pcs. timber, Order. Emanuel @ Gothenburg,—1,85 deals, Order.
April 19. St. Johannes @ Joannesund,—7,444 battens, Ferguson, Davidson & Co. Agalie @ Skien,—39,600 pcs. wood, 6,272 palings, Order.
April 23. Ludwig @ Fredrickstadt,—3,721 battens, Order. Carl @ Skien,—3,721 battens, Order. Vistula @ Stettin,—50 pcs. wainscot, Order.
April 24. Jane Marie @ Sannesund,—8,931 battens, Wm. Stewart & Co.

BO'NESS.

April 10. Thor @ Christiania,—10,425 props, Love & Stewart. Hortensia @ Falkenburg,—15,995 props, Love & Stewart. Baltic @ Porsgrund,—6,638 props, Love & Stewart. Falken @ Christiania,—15,088 props, Lunan & Co. Meteor @ Christiania,—11,038 Lunan & Co. Freia @ Christiania,—9,000 props, W. Donaldson. John @ Sandefiord,—10,727 props, C. Salvesen & Co.
April 13. Hermod @ Christiania,—6,996 props, J. Denholm & Co.
April 19. Briton @ Sandefiord,—5,596 props, 379 pcs. timber, 20 tons birch bark, A. Gulstad & Co. Fanny @ Falkenburg,—5,190 props, Love & Stewart. Neutral @ Christiansand,—11,647 props, Love & Stewart. Elisabeth @ Falkenburg,—26,274 props, A. Gulstad & Co. Auguste @ Halmstad,—3,985 props, Forbes & Co. Peter and Wilhelm @ Halmstad,—2,764 props, Gulstad & Co.
April 20. Fortuna @ Gothenburg, 15,484 props, Denholm & Co. Marie @ Brake,—4,176 props, Order.

GRANTON.

April 19. Ingeborg @ Gothenburg,—140 cases pulp, 57 loads battens, 400 bdls. lath, Order. Fils Unique @ Mandal,—6,800 props, Order.
April 23. Karine @ St. Malo,—324 pcs. oak, Order.
